NEWS: ChatGPT is eating up the software layer.
 
This will change SaaS dramatically:

Old playbook:
✖ Create a new app with a new interface.
✖Try your best to convince people to use it.
✖ Face customer frustration to learn a new app.

New playbook:
☑ Your app is built for ChatGPT.
☑ Your users use your app + ChatGPT.
☑ They already know the interface & trust it.

ChatGPT went from 100 to 800 million users in 2 years. That's your new potential market, & growing.

OpenAI isn't just coming after browsers or search engines. It wants to be the entire operating system.
